name: Owly Crawler
description:
PLEASE VOTE FOR THIS GAME :https://lpgmahieu.typeform.com/to/pvKKoB

The old owl is dead, and the ancients are looking for the next leader of the tribe. The leader will be chose only if he proves himself worthy.

In this single player game, you will send a warband of proud warriors and shamans in nasty dungeons, infested by monsters. Will you be able to lead them to the victory, or will you meet a gruesome death?  Your faith is yours.
